name: Anghami Inc.
description: Anghami Inc. is a leading music streaming platform in the Arab world, dedicated to providing a vast library of Arabic and international music. Founded in 2012 by Eddy Maroun and Elie Habib, Anghami aims to enhance the music experience for users by offering personalized playlists, curated content, and exclusive releases from popular Arab artists. With its user-friendly interface, Anghami allows subscribers to listen to millions of songs on-demand, create custom playlists, and discover new music through its smart recommendation algorithms. The platform also emphasizes local content, promoting emerging artists and culturally significant music across the Middle East and North Africa. Anghami has gained significant traction in a region where music consumption is rapidly evolving, standing out with features like offline listening and high-quality audio streaming. In addition to its music offerings, Anghami is committed to integrating social features, enabling users to share their favorite tracks and playlists with friends, fostering a vibrant community of music lovers. As the music industry transforms with the growth of digital platforms, Anghami continues to innovate and expand its services, contributing to the diverse musical landscape of the Arab world.

seo.meta_title: Anghami Inc. | Leading Music Streaming in the Arab World
seo.meta_description: Explore Anghami Inc., the premier music streaming platform in the Arab world, offering a vast library of Arabic and international music with personalized features.

faq.question: What is Anghami?
faq.answer: Anghami is a music streaming platform that provides access to a large library of Arabic and international music.

faq.question: Who founded Anghami?
faq.answer: Anghami was founded by Eddy Maroun and Elie Habib in 2012.

faq.question: Where is Anghami headquartered?
faq.answer: Anghami is headquartered in Beirut, Lebanon.

faq.question: What services does Anghami offer?
faq.answer: Anghami offers a subscription service and a free tier service, allowing users to stream music on-demand.

faq.question: What makes Anghami unique?
faq.answer: Anghami stands out by focusing on Arabic music and providing personalized playlists and social features.
